basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Jaime Burns Scholarship in Criminal Justice

description: This scholarship is awarded to an excelling student with the chosen major of Criminal Justice. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Criminal Justice major Preference is given to students who plan to pursue a career in corrections Minimum 3.3 GPA Minimum of 60 hours of coursework completed Must include a two page, double spaced essay addressing: 1. What are your career goals? 2. What is your philosophy on corrections? 3. How do you see yourself impacting the Criminal Justice System?

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
